Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Obstetric Labor Complications/Cephalopelvic Disproportion
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A condition in which the HEAD of the FETUS is larger than the mother's PELVIS through which the fetal head must pass during a vaginal delivery.
